name: Project Astronaut
description:
Project Astronaut is a 2D platformer. This game is the first game I have ever created. I created this game using GameMaker Studio 1.4. The goal of this game is to colect all the fuel resources, kill enemies, and finish as fast as possible. This game is not the best but it's my first. I decided to share it out here for you to provide feedback.

Controls:
A - Move Left
D - Move Right
W - Jump/Enter Door
ESC - Exit
